response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $1,200,000. Given its exceptional quality and unparalleled benefits, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or operations. To ensure this opportunity aligns perfectly with your financial planning, I am offering you the chance to acquire it at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This exclusive offer is valid for a limited time only, so I encourage you to consider this proposition carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 1100000}
